forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 53F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
